snippet: The campaign of Mitt Romney, who has assailed the lobbying culture of Washington, will get advice from a well-known lobbyist.
abstract: The campaign of Mitt Romney, who has assailed the lobbying culture of Washington, will get advice from a well-known lobbyist.
lead_paragraph: 2:39 p.m. | Updated DES MOINES -- Mitt Romney has added a veteran Washington lobbyist -- Charlie Black, a top political aide to Senator John McCain's 2008 presidential campaign -- to the circle of informal advisers who are trying to help to guide him to the White House.

headline.main: Veteran Lobbyist to Advise Romney Campaign
